body_html: Problem is, I'm trying to run two model at the same time in a website. Hence, calling K.clear_session in the code clears operations that are used elsewhere. So this creates a bug. I really need to be able to specify the operations that I want to clear. Could you be a little more precise on how I could do that ?

body: Problem is, I'm trying to run two model at the same time in a website. Hence, calling `K.clear_session` in the code clears operations that are used elsewhere. So this creates a bug. I really need to be able to specify the operations that I want to clear. Could you be a little more precise on how I could do that ?
